snippet: French prosecutors say six people have been arrested in connection with a melee at Air France’s headquarters that left two executives shirtless.
abstract: Six people are arrested in connection with assault on Air France executives by union activists during meeting about company's controversial plan to cut jobs and increase working hours.
lead_paragraph: French prosecutors say six people have been arrested in connection with a melee at Air France’s headquarters that left two executives shirtless.

headline.main: 6 Arrested in Air France Fracas That Sent Managers Fleeing
headline.print_headline: 6 Arrested in Air France Fray That Sent Managers Fleeing
